hint: Convert implicit joins to explicit joins, push down selective filters early, and decorrelate subqueries to reduce row counts before aggregation.
Isolate date and dimension filters into separate CTEs, then restructure joins to improve predicate pushdown and reduce intermediate result size.
Materialize all filtered dimension and fact tables into CTEs, then restructure the self-join and anti-join using precomputed aggregates to minimize repeated scans.
Transform EXISTS/NOT EXISTS subqueries using decorrelation techniques, decompose the self-join into a grouped CTE, and leverage explicit joins with isolated date filtering.
